nodes.name: Set Some Fields1
nodes.notes:
Edit Element object field to now contain image location url. In OpenAI's case, 

current contend id folder/current package deliverable folder/intermediate production assets folder

nodes.name: If Status == Success, else Wait to Finish3
Upload final file to google drive1
tracks
nodes.notes:
Creates tracks array for FFMpeg/Compose Call. Splits video elements and audio elements into separate tracks, passing video track only if no audio elements exist.

Coded by Claude. Chat: https://claude.ai/chat/cfb52c71-278f-45f7-aa0d-e23b14400180

nodes.name: add first (& only) element's values to sequence

parameters.content:

OUTPUT

sequences.internal_use_only_sequence_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of sequence generation and stuff

elements.internal_use_only_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff
elements.generation_of_video_sound_prompt: Soft rustling of delicate feathers in gentle breeze, subtle whisper-like sounds, organic texture with slight variation in intensity, peaceful and mesmerizing audio that matches the visual shimmer
elements.video_generation_prompt: Close-up macro shot of iridescent bird feathers catching golden hour sunlight, gentle breeze causing subtle movement and shimmer. Shallow depth of field with bokeh background of forest canopy. Cinematic color grading with warm amber and teal tones. Shot transitions from extreme close-up to slight pull-back revealing feather texture details. 4K quality, smooth camera movement, dreamy atmospheric lighting.

video_gen_input_body.prompt: Close-up macro shot of iridescent bird feathers catching golden hour sunlight, gentle breeze causing subtle movement and shimmer. Shallow depth of field with bokeh background of forest canopy. Cinematic color grading with warm amber and teal tones. Shot transitions from extreme close-up to slight pull-back revealing feather texture details. 4K quality, smooth camera movement, dreamy atmospheric lighting.

elements.internal_use_only_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff
elements.video_generation_prompt: Seamless transition from feather close-up to reveal a majestic bird in natural habitat. Elegant slow-motion flight sequence showing wing detail and graceful movement through dappled forest light. Camera follows bird's movement with smooth tracking, showcasing the connection between individual feathers and the complete creature. Rich depth of field, cinematic composition, golden hour lighting continues.

video_gen_input_body.prompt: Seamless transition from feather close-up to reveal a majestic bird in natural habitat. Elegant slow-motion flight sequence showing wing detail and graceful movement through dappled forest light. Camera follows bird's movement with smooth tracking, showcasing the connection between individual feathers and the complete creature. Rich depth of field, cinematic composition, golden hour lighting continues.

elements.audio_generation_prompt: Musical development building from intro - piano melody joined by soft strings and subtle percussion. Organic, flowing composition that mirrors bird flight with rising and falling phrases. Nature-inspired harmony with gentle electronic ambience. 10-second progression that supports visual storytelling without overwhelming. Maintains 70 BPM, evolving from C major to related keys.

elements.internal_use_only_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff
elements.generation_of_video_sound_prompt: Gentle landing sounds with feathers settling, soft rustling diminishing to peaceful whisper, creating sense of completion and rest, maintaining the signature feather texture but with resolution and calm
elements.video_generation_prompt: Final dramatic moment - bird lands gracefully on branch, feathers settling into place. Extreme close-up return to individual feathers but now with context of the complete story. Feathers catch final rays of golden light, creating a sense of completion and beauty. Shallow focus emphasizing feather details with soft background blur. Peaceful, satisfying conclusion with gentle camera movement.

video_gen_input_body.prompt: Final dramatic moment - bird lands gracefully on branch, feathers settling into place. Extreme close-up return to individual feathers but now with context of the complete story. Feathers catch final rays of golden light, creating a sense of completion and beauty. Shallow focus emphasizing feather details with soft background blur. Peaceful, satisfying conclusion with gentle camera movement.
